title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Providence (Toronto, ON) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: Just the normal interview questions were asked and some situational too. I just based mostly my answer on what I have experienced with my previous jobs as a nurse. Just relax and be yourself.
Interview Questions: What would you do if you saw someone abusing a patient?

title: Clinical Data Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Providence in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions:
Applied on Indeed, and then was directed to apply directed through their website link. They use a modern hire program that sends you texts of specific experience questions to help make sure you are a suitable candidate. 

A few days later I was invited to do a self-paced video screen answering 3 questions and recording myself.

A week later I was invited to do a zoom panel interview.
Interview Questions: Introduction of myself, describe a time I provided best service (and why was it the best), leadership experience.

title: Recreation Program Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Providence
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. Got a call back to setup for a 30 minute phone screening. Resume sent to management after HR screening. Interview with panel of 4-5 people. Site leader or manager will call back if you are successful after you submit 2-3 references to HR to verify.
Interview Questions:
Job position, how you would do things if you were the successful candidate for the job at Providence. 

Scenario questions. How would you handle a resident who was this or that. And why would you do what you would do?

title: RPN Interview
Interview Descriptions: Frist, there is a pre screening on phone call and then written test. They ask about medication calculating, some of medication, they values. Minimum passing rate is 80 percentage. If you pass the written test, you will have in-person interview with two people.
Interview Questions: What do you know about our hospital?

title: Clerk Typist-3 Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Providence (Vancouver, BC) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions:
I applied online and received an email and questions to answer. A week later I was given a call and a brief interview.

They didn't call me on the stated time, so I called them. Got an interview with 2 people.
Interview Questions: Describe a conflict you had with another co worker.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Providence (Toronto, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Initially contacted by HR representative who asked a few questions then arranged a date and time for an in person interview. The in-person interview took place infront of a panel of individuals who took turns asking questions ranging from seeking out my knoledge of the organization, behavioural questions, and specific work scenerios. The interview was then followed by a multiple choice and short answer written exam.
Interview Questions: Can you give an example of when you had a disagreement with a colleague and how you handled it?

title: Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Providence (Scarborough Township, ON) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: Phone call, then In person interview which took place all on one day. I found it easier than I thought it will be.  At first it was little hard to find the place, but finally found it.
Interview Questions: Why did you want to work here?

title: LMS Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Providence (Toronto, ON) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was a fairly lengthy interview but overall pretty easy. I had to meet with several team members and give a presentation as well. People were very nice and receptive, but I wish they provided water or some other kind of refreshment.

title: Decision Support Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Providence (Vancouver, BC)
Interview Descriptions: First, HR conducts a phone interview to collect broad information about your experiences. Next, the team conducts a face-to-face interview to ask about your qualifications and past experiences. After that, the team invites you to come again for a case study.

title: Food Service Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Providence (Guelph, ON) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Conducted by Manager and Full time supervisor. General staff questions as well as specific questions for the role. It was pretty casual. This was to cover a maternity leave. They needed the role filled quickly.
Interview Questions: Why I work in this field
